freelanceProject.projectDescription: I built a shop website for <mark>Maitri Studio</mark>, a Common Service Center (<mark>CSC</mark>), using <mark>HTML</mark>, <mark>CSS</mark>, and <mark>JavaScript</mark>. The website showcases their <mark>services</mark> in an intuitive and engaging manner. I used <mark>Swiper JS</mark> to implement dynamic, touch-friendly image sliders, enhancing the user experience. Additionally, I integrated <mark>Google Apps Script</mark> to fetch and display files directly from <mark>Google Drive</mark>, ensuring the website stays up-to-date with the latest service offerings. The project highlights my ability to create responsive, interactive, and user-friendly websites from scratch, leveraging modern libraries and tools to meet client needs.

I worked for a client to create a comprehensive website from Scratch using <mark>HTML</mark>, <mark>CSS</mark>, and <mark>JavaScript</mark>. The website features <mark>nine pages</mark>, including an apply page where applicants can submit their details. These details are stored in <mark>Google Sheets</mark>, and <mark>email notifications</mark> are sent to both the owner and the applicant upon submission. I integrated <mark>Swiper JS</mark> for responsive sliders, <mark>Typed JS</mark> for dynamic text effects, and <mark>jsPDF</mark> to merge image files into a single PDF. The PDF is then uploaded to <mark>Google Drive</mark>, and its link is stored in the sheet. Additionally, I implemented a feature that allows the owner to retrieve <mark>specific applicant details from Google Sheets</mark> by entering the applicant's name, streamlining the application management process.
